title: Recipes
text:
Preface
These are the recipes I like to use.

title: 1  Biscuits
text:
4oz marg
4oz light brown sugar
1 egg
1tsp vanilla
5oz SR flour
3oz oats
8oz choc chips





190C
15-20mins
19 x NA

title: 1  Biscuits
text:
1.2 Shortbread




8oz butter
8oz (icing sugar + cornflour)
8oz plain flour
demerara sugar





170C
15mins
37 x 5.5cm

title: 2  Cakes
text:
2.1 Carrot Cake
Notes
- Replace eggs with 7.5oz apple puree and 3/2tsp BP
- May need to cook a little longer with foil on top

title: 2  Cakes
text:
6oz marg
6oz light brown sugar
3 eggs
4oz carrot
2oz raisins
2oz dates
1/2tsp cinnamon
1/4tsp nutmeg
1oz coconut
1oz walnuts
6oz wholemeal flour
pinch salt
1tsp BP





180C
90mins
1 x 8” round

title: 2  Cakes
text:
2.2 Ginger Cake




8oz SR flour
1/2tsp B of S
2tsp ginger
1/2tsp cinnamon
1/4 pt milk
4oz marg
4tbsp treacle
4os dark brown sugar
2 eggs





180C
45mins
1 x 8” round


Method


- Melt milk, marg, treacle, sugar

title: 2  Cakes
text:
2.3 Loaves




5oz marg
5oz caster
2 eggs
7oz SR flour
3tbs milk





180C
60mins
1 x loaf


Notes


- Cherry & Almond:
- 4oz cherries, 2oz ground almond
- Lemon Drizzle:
- zest 2 lemons, 4tbsp (juice and caster sugar)

title: 2  Cakes
text:
2.4 Victoria Cake




8oz mix
1tsp BP





180C
25-30mins
2 x 8” round


Notes


- Or makes 20 fairy cakes or 16 cupcakes

title: 3  Traybakes
text:
3.1 Chocolate Caramel Shortbread
Method
- Bring to boil then boil gently 7 mins

title: 3  Traybakes
text:
Base:
10oz P flour
5oz caster sugar
pinch salt
10oz butter

Filling:
4oz marg
1 tin condensed milk
4oz light brown sugar
4tbsp syrup





180C
25mins
1 x 11” square

title: 3  Traybakes
text:
3.2 Traybakes




5oz marg
3oz plain chocolate
9oz light brown sugar
2 eggs
1tsp strong coffee
4oz P flour
1oz cocoa
pinch salt
4oz chocolate chips





170C
30mins
NA x 8” square


Method


- Melt marg, chocolate, sugar

title: 4  Other
text:
8oz SR flour
1tsp BP
pinch salt
2oz butter
2oz caster sugar
1/4 pt milk





220C
10mins
NA x NA

title: 4  Other
text:
4.2 Scotch Pancakes




8oz SR flour
1tsp BP
2oz caster sugar
pinch salt
2 eggs
milk -> dropping consistency





NAC
NAmins
NA x NA
